## Emojis

Emojis can be added to review comments to separate blocking and non-blocking comments.

Example: Compliments, small suggestions or questions that don't block a merge.

> ğŸŸ¢ Liked the refactor!

> ğŸŸ¡ Why was this value removed?

Example: Blocking feedbacks must be addressed before a merge.

> ğŸ”´ This change will break an important system flow

| Type | Examples | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Blocking | ğŸ”´ âŒ ğŸš¨ | Red emojis |
| Non-blocking | ğŸŸ¡ ğŸ’¡ ğŸ¤” ğŸ’­ | Yellow emojis, pensive, etc |
| Compliment | ğŸŸ¢ ğŸ’š ğŸ˜ ğŸ‘ ğŸ™Œ | Green emojis, hearts, positives, etc |
